products.name: iPhone 15 Pro Max 256GB
products.description: Latest Apple iPhone with A17 Pro chip, 48MP main camera, ProMotion display, and Titanium design. 256GB storage capacity with advanced camera system and all-day battery life.

products.name: AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)
products.description: Apple AirPods Pro with Active Noise Cancellation, Spatial Audio, and Adaptive EQ. Features H2 chip for enhanced sound quality and up to 6 hours of listening time.

products.name: MacBook Air M3 13-inch
products.description: Apple MacBook Air powered by M3 chip, 13-inch Liquid Retina display, 8GB unified memory, and 256GB SSD storage. Ultra-thin design perfect for productivity and creativity.

products.name: Apple Watch Series 9 GPS
products.description: Apple Watch Series 9 with 45mm case, GPS, Always-On Retina display, and advanced health features including heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and fitness metrics.

products.name: iPad Air M2 256GB
products.description: Apple iPad Air with M2 chip, 11-inch Liquid Retina display, 256GB storage, and Apple Pencil support. Perfect for creative work, note-taking, and entertainment.

products.name: Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans
products.description: Classic Levi's 501 Original Fit jeans in dark blue wash. Premium denim with button fly, straight leg, and timeless design. Made from 100% cotton for durability and comfort.

products.name: Zara Basic Cotton T-Shirt
products.description: Premium cotton t-shirt from Zara in various colors. Soft, breathable fabric with classic fit. Perfect for everyday casual wear and layering.

products.name: H&M Winter Wool Sweater
products.description: Cozy wool-blend sweater from H&M perfect for cold weather. Soft, warm material with modern design. Available in multiple colors and sizes for men and women.

products.name: Nike Dri-FIT Sports T-Shirt
products.description: Nike Dri-FIT moisture-wicking performance t-shirt for sports and workouts. Breathable fabric with classic Nike design. Ideal for running, gym, and active lifestyle.

products.name: Adidas Classic Track Jacket
products.description: Adidas Originals track jacket with iconic three-stripe design. Lightweight and comfortable with zip-up front. Perfect for casual wear and light athletic activities.

products.name: Humayun Ahmed - Debi
products.description: Classic Bengali novel by Humayun Ahmed. A captivating story of love, loss, and human emotions. One of the most beloved books in Bengali literature.

products.name: Sharat Chandra Chattopadhyay - Srikanto
products.description: Epic Bengali novel by Sharat Chandra Chattopadhyay. A timeless classic exploring human relationships, society, and personal growth in rural Bengal.

products.name: Python Crash Course - Eric Matthes
products.description: Complete guide to Python programming for beginners. Learn Python fundamentals with hands-on projects and exercises. Perfect for aspiring programmers and developers.

products.name: You Don't Know JS - Kyle Simpson
products.description: Deep dive into JavaScript language mechanics. Advanced concepts for serious developers. Part of the popular 'You Don't Know JS' series covering JavaScript in depth.

products.name: Clean Code - Robert C. Martin
products.description: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship. Learn to write clean, maintainable code with best practices and design principles. Essential reading for professional developers.

products.name: Hathi Premium Sofa Set (3+2+1)
products.description: Luxurious 3-seater, 2-seater, and single-seater sofa set from Hathi. Premium quality upholstery with comfortable cushions. Perfect for modern living rooms with elegant design.

products.name: Hathi Dining Table Set (6 Seater)
products.description: Modern dining table with 6 matching chairs from Hathi. Solid wood construction with elegant finish. Perfect for family dinners and gatherings.

products.name: Hathi Wardrobe with Mirror (5 Door)
products.description: Spacious 5-door wardrobe from Hathi with full-length mirror. Multiple compartments and drawers for organized storage. Modern design with quality wood construction.

products.name: Hathi Coffee Table with Storage
products.description: Modern coffee table with hidden storage compartment from Hathi. Sleek design perfect for living rooms. Made from high-quality materials with smooth finish.

products.name: Hathi Study Table with Bookshelf
products.description: Multifunctional study table with attached bookshelf from Hathi. Perfect for students and home offices. Spacious work surface with organized storage compartments.

products.name: Nike Air Max Running Shoes
products.description: Professional running shoes from Nike with Air Max cushioning technology. Superior comfort and performance for long-distance running. Breathable mesh upper with excellent grip.

products.name: Adidas Football (Size 5)
products.description: Official size 5 football from Adidas. Professional quality with excellent grip and durability. Perfect for training and competitive matches. FIFA approved.

products.name: Wilson Tennis Racket Pro Staff
products.description: Professional tennis racket from Wilson with carbon fiber construction. Advanced string technology for power and control. Used by professional players worldwide.

products.name: Yonex Badminton Racket ArcSaber
products.description: High-performance badminton racket from Yonex. Lightweight design with excellent control and power. Perfect for competitive play and training sessions.

products.name: Reebok Adjustable Dumbbells Set (20kg)
products.description: Adjustable dumbbell set from Reebok with weight range up to 20kg. Space-saving design perfect for home gym. Easy weight adjustment with secure locking mechanism.
